thread.title: Details set for Republican party's November debate
thread.title_full: Details set for Republican party's November debate - US News

author: USNews
title: Details set for Republican party's November debate
text:
Details set for Republican party's November presidential debate Associated Press Oct. 12, 2015 | 5:31 p.m. EDT + More By STEVE PEOPLES, Associated Press
WASHINGTON (AP) â€” The Republican party's 2016 presidential contenders will meet on the debate stage next month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
That's according to the debate host, Fox Business News, which on Monday announced the date and location of the GOP's Nov. 10 debate. The primetime affair will be held in the city's Milwaukee Theater.
The Wisconsin faceoff is the fourth presidential debate sanctioned by the Republican National Committee. The host network has yet to announce the participation criteria. Previous criteria depended upon national polls.
The news comes on the eve of the Democratic party's first presidential debate.
Republicans have four more debates scheduled before the Iowa caucuses in February. That includes a meeting later this month in Colorado.
